description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Br8kIn'; pronounced(Break In) is a remake of a classic console hit.  This new version has been created using the HuskySoft engine with a progressive design.  Gone are the simple blocks of yesterday, and your "paddle" is now as dynamic as the levels that you are using it in. Enjoy!
description.short: Br8kIn'; pronounced(Break In) is a remake of a classic console hit.  This new version has been created using the HuskySoft engine with a progressive design.
